#summary How to integrate Objectify into a Maven project

Objectify artifacts compatible with Maven 2 are available from the [http://maven.objectify-appengine.googlecode.com/git/ Objectify Maven repository].

*Note:  The old svn-based repository has been retired.  The repository has a new git-based URL.*

= Repository =

To add Objectify to your Maven project, add this to your `pom.xml`:
{{{
  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.googlecode.objectify</groupId>
      <artifactId>objectify</artifactId>
      <version>3.0</version>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>

  <repositories>
    <repository>
      <id>objectify-appengine</id>
      <url>http://maven.objectify-appengine.googlecode.com/git/</url>
    </repository>
  </repositories>
}}}
